Row.Text: If an unit having 2 or more promotion levels is killed in combat, receive a free unit of the same kind in your capital. Starts the game with 20 [ICON_Faith] Faith (on Standard Speed). If Ameth has not founded a Religion, grants a free [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet when their first Holy Site is constructed. Ameth and Kokkoro are seen as duplicate leaders. Gain the Kokkoro unique unit.

When the first technology or civic of a new Era is researched, earn an [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration of that Era. When in a Dark Age, [ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspirations can finish research of technologies or civics instantly. +2 [ICON_Science] Science, +2 [ICON_Production] Production, and +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold from each [ICON_GreatWork_Portrait] Memory Piece Great Work.

[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Guildhouse bonus: Has slots for 3 Great Works of Art. Unlocks the Enter Dream World project, which grants a Guild Member that generates a [ICON_GreatWork_Portrait] Memory Piece Great Work when activated upon completion.

[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Guildhouse bonus: Has slots for 3 Great Works of Art, and is automatically themed when it have all its slots filled. Unlocks the Enter Dream World project, which grants a [ICON_GreatArtist] Guild Member that generates a [ICON_GreatWork_Portrait] Memory Piece Great Work when activated upon completion.

Landosol unique anti-cavalry unit when Ameth is their leader. Can only earn 1 by founding a Religion. Has 3 [ICON_Movement] Movement. Has base [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength equal to the strongest unit your cities have produced. When killed, retreats with 1 HP to the [ICON_Capital] Capital. Has a unique promotion tree.

Answer your followers' prayers, venerable Ameth, for you have duties of a goddess. Your messengers will always be loyal to you despite all difficulties they have faced. Guide your people through dreams to reveal mysteries, and protect them well during their hard times. Step into the world to reshape history, and write down happy endings for your epics on your own.

+50% [ICON_Production] Production toward recon units. +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength on a continent other than your home continent to recon units. May construct the Maho Maho Camp in the City Center.

Receives +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each Delegation or Embassy from a foreign civilization. Each time you found your first city on a continent other than your home continent receive a free Settler and a recon unit. +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement on a continent other than your home continent to all units.{LOC_SELF_DEFENSE_GROUP_GUILDHOUSE_BONUS}

A building unique to Maho (Explorer). Provides +1 Loyalty per turn in this city. If the city already has maximum Loyalty, also provides an additional +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture. Additional +1 Loyalty per turn and +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold if built in a city not on your original [ICON_Capital] Capital's continent. Improved [ICON_RESOURCE_COTTON] Cotton and [ICON_RESOURCE_DYES] Dyes in this city gain +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture each.

[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Guildhouse bonus: +50% combat experience and +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for all land units trained in this city. Additional +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when these units are in your territory or adjacent to your territory. +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity when this city has a garrisoned unit.

Rule, Maho, the fairytale princess, your era has come. Darkness hide in this world, but you teach your people to keep optimistic at all times. Your court is guarded by your legion, and they are ready to heed your call and set out on an expedition. Trust your people, and may them gain magical power to make your dreams come true under your reign.
